solution_line_template: First find how many of the peaches are fresh, which is {total_peaches} peaches * {fresh_percentage_num}% = <<{total_peaches}*{fresh_percentage_num}*{percent_factor}={fresh_peaches}>>{fresh_peaches} peaches.

Then, subtract the number Brenda throws away after the fresh count, which is {fresh_peaches} peaches - {thrown_away_peaches} peaches = <<{fresh_peaches}-{thrown_away_peaches}={peaches_left}>>{peaches_left} peaches.
